page.title: 01SUPERNATURAL
page.content: Hazlegrove House has many supernatural connections and the following are only just a few. The Mildmay family rebuilt Hazlegrove in the 18th century. Now, for an unknown reason, whenever a Mildmay passes Hazlegrove's gates a ball of fire follows them on the drive. The strange thing is that only a Mildmay can see the fireball. The Mildmay family still inhabits Hazlegrove, in a way, as the ghost of Carew Hervey Mildmay, wearing a brown hat with a feather in it, walks around Hazlegrove, checking that everyone is safe and happy. Hazlegrove has its royal ghosts as well: the ghost of Catherine of Aragon haunts a small room where she spent some of her exile from King Henry VIII.{ {
